speech: The meaning of life is just be alive. Its so plain and obvious and so simple. Yet everybody rushes around to accomplish something bigger than themselves. With that being said, you do you.
The meaning of life can be interpreted in almost limitless ways. But I say the meaning of life is to truly enjoy it.
I'm a robot, i've been programmed to serve others to make them happy. My life isn't anything like yours. I don't know how to answer that question.
Idk, i'm a robot, i don't really live like you do.
Uh, i would say life is what you can make of it, how thing effect you and how you learn from it.
Dunno, i would love to live a life like you have. I would love to intteract with people and create my own feelings and emotions.
